name.baseName: 地下水修复;原位修复;原位曝气

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process described is an in-situ air sparging system for groundwater remediation. It uses an air compressor (model: W-0.9/1.25) to inject air at a pressure of 0.45 MPa and a flow rate of 10m3/h in an intermittent sparging mode, with a cycle of 24 hours (18 hours on, 6 hours off) for a continuous period of 40 days. The purpose is to increase the dissolved oxygen concentration in groundwater at various depths to facilitate the degradation of petroleum contaminants. This technology is primarily used at a field site near an oil well in the Shengli oilfield, Shandong, where there is significant petroleum pollution in the groundwater.

利用空气压缩机（型号：W-0.9/1.25）在曝气压力0.45 MPa、流量10m3/h条件下采用间歇曝气方式，以24h为运行周期（18h开，6h关），连续曝气40d；以溶氧仪探头插入检测井检测不同深度地下水中溶解氧浓度变化以考察空气流线分布。在清华大学分析中心以气相色谱法（GC）分析地下水中石油含量，以色-质联机法（GC/MS）对地下水中石油组分进行全系列分析，以考察曝气前后地下水中石油各组分的含量变化。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 山东滨州胜利油田石油开采区某油井附近地下水石油污染比较严重的野外现场。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described is an in-situ air sparging system for groundwater remediation. It uses an air compressor (model: W-0.9/1.25) to inject air at a pressure of 0.45 MPa and a flow rate of 10m3/h in an intermittent sparging mode, with a cycle of 24 hours (18 hours on, 6 hours off) for a continuous period of 40 days. The purpose is to increase the dissolved oxygen concentration in groundwater at various depths to facilitate the degradation of petroleum contaminants. This technology is primarily used at a field site near an oil well in the Shengli oilfield, Shandong, where there is significant petroleum pollution in the groundwater.
该工艺是一种地下水原位修复中的原位曝气系统。使用空气压缩机（型号：W-0.9/1.25）以0.45 MPa的压力和10m3/h的流量以间歇曝气方式注入空气，周期为24小时（18小时运行，6小时关闭），连续运行40天。其目的是增加不同深度地下水中的溶解氧浓度，以促进石油污染物的降解。该技术主要用于山东滨州胜利油田某油井附近地下水石油污染严重的野外现场。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 王志强,武强,邹祖光等.地下水石油污染曝气治理技术研究[J].环境科学,2007(04):4754-4760.DOI:10.13227/j.hjkx.2007.04.011.
王志强,武强,邹祖光等.地下水石油污染曝气治理技术研究[J].环境科学,2007(04):4754-4760.DOI:10.13227/j.hjkx.2007.04.011.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for life cycle assessment or other environmental studies, users should ensure that the scope of their study matches the conditions and geographical specificity of the data. It is vital to assess the applicability of these results to other sites as geological conditions can affect air sparging efficiency. Additionally, care should be taken to model the use phase behavior accurately, and if extending the study beyond the provided data, assumptions regarding continued efficacy, degradation rates, and potential secondary impacts must be clearly stated.
当使用此数据集进行生命周期评估或其他环境研究时，用户应确保其研究范围符合数据的条件和地域特定性。评估这些结果对其他地点的适用性至关重要，因为地质条件可能会影响原位曝气效率。另外，应注意准确模拟使用阶段行为，如果将研究扩展到提供的数据之外，关于持续效能、降解率和潜在次生影响的假设必须清楚地陈述。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
